definition: return to the original position or state after being stretched or compressed
details:
verb
- return to the original position or state after being stretched or compressed
= example: return to the original position or state after being stretched or compressed
- formally reject or disavow a formerly held belief, usually under pressure
= synonyms: abjure, recant, forswear, retract
- spring back
= synonyms: spring
- pull out from an agreement, contract, statement, etc.
= example: pull out from an agreement, contract, statement, etc.
